messages.speech:
Resolution:
This is a known user error issue where the agent makes changes to the claimants name using Edit Claim Data and Levers instead of reporting a CoC journey.
Problem PRB4074634 has been raised to address this issue.
There is a user workaround available. Please follow below steps –
1.	Launch Universal Credit from CAMLite.
2.	Click on ‘Edit claim data and levers’
3.	Click on 'Current award'
4.	The user then needs to modify the affected name so that is matches the below rules:
•	First name – Mandatory.
	Max 35 alphabet characters
	Allowable characters are: Alphabets, Apostrophe ('), Full Stop (.), Hyphen (-)
	Spaces not allowed.
	First character must be uppercase Alphabet. 
	Last character must not be punctuation. 
	Consecutive punctuation characters not allowed"

•	Middle name - Optional. 
	Max 35 alphabet characters 
	Allowable characters are: Alphabets, Apostrophe ('), Full Stop (.), Hyphen (-), space ( ).
	First character must be uppercase Alphabet.
	 Last character must not be punctuation.
	 Consecutive spaces not allowed. 
	Consecutive punctuation characters not allowed. 
	Spaces before or after punctuation not allowed.

•	Surname - Mandatory. 
	Max 35 alphabet characters
	 Allowable characters: Alphabet, Apostrophe ('), Full Stop (.), Hyphen (-), space ( ).
	First character must be uppercase Alphabet. 
	Last character must not be punctuation. 
	Consecutive spaces not allowed. 
	Consecutive punctuation characters not allowed. 
	Spaces before or after punctuation not allowed.
5.	Mark the 'Marked for Verification flag' as ‘Yes’ under 'Award Processing Flags' section.
6.	Mark 'RTE' as 'Send Registration' under 'External System Registrations' section
7.	Click the 'Save' button at the bottom of the page
8.	Login to Claim Admin
9.	Click on ‘View Evidence’
10.	Complete the verification.
11.	Wait for 2 hours
12.	Click on ‘Edit Claim Data and Levers’
13.	Click on 'Current award'
14.	Mark the 'Marked for Verification flag' as ‘Yes’ under 'Award Processing Flags' section.
15 . Click the 'Save' button at the bottom of the page
